title: Brie's Christmas Pearls
description: Brie’s Christmas Pearls (Submissive in Love, #3)  Christmas magic with a little kink…  Brie’s Master has kept something from her that threatens to tear them apart. When confronted, dark emotions are awakened but the couple is part of a tight community that won’t let them fail. Brie believes in the magic of Christmas and plans the perfect gift. Little does she know she’s about to experience some Christmas magic of her own - with a touch of kink.  What happens when condor love collides head-on with Master’s demons? Pearls, naturally...  Adult Reading Material (18+) This book is for mature audiences only and contains sexually explicit content.
author: Red Phoenix
